articles.title: Bolivia new president takes over , inherits economic mess
articles.summary: Rodrigo Paz, a pro-business conservative, took office on Saturday (November 8, 2025) as Bolivia‚Äôs president, ending nearly 20 years of socialist rule and inheriting acute economic woes. articles.title: Gaza health officials say over 69 , 000 Palestinians have been killed in Israel
articles.summary: Gaza health officials say that over 69,000 Palestinians have been killed in the Israel-Hamas war so far. Gaza's Health Ministry, on Saturday (November 8, 2025), said that the death toll has climbed to 69,169, with another 170,685 wounded since Hamas's October 7, 2023, attack into Israel. Cara began her career on the crime beat at Newsday. She has written for Marie Claire, The Washington Post and The Wall Street Journal. She reports on justice and human rights issues.
